description:
Grandmas Are Strong
Grandma and her best friends, Sakie and Iyo, gathered together to discuss what books to read at the children`s gathering. In one of the discussions, one said that she would like to sleep like Snow White...
Transfer Student
In Bunji`s class, there is a new transfer student named Minoru. Bunji tries to look after him but his attitude is difficult. Bunji decides to follow Minoru after school...
First Grade and Sixth Grade
Fumi has recently become good friends with Sho who is in sixth grade. When she becomes friends with her, she has started to grow and become a big girl, but...
Everyone Together
Mom and her family, all four of them, have come to a department store. Dad always gets excited, but Bunji and Fumi are used to it. Dad decides to raise the stakes and...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Grandmas are Strong / Transfer Student / First Grade and Sixth Grade / Everyone Together
パパは強し / 転校生 / 一年生と六年生 / みんなそろって
